description:
This 14 part videos series covers the nuts and bolts of how to make a video for the non-profit you love.  Using real video case studies and a lot of ambiguously offensive humor, I will equip you with the bare necessities to make your first video.  Topics covered in this course include:

Cameras

Filming

Lighting

B-Roll

Photographs

Interview technique

Music

Content

Distribution

There are no needed materials, equipment or software needed for this course.  The course is structured into 14 short lecture videos.  This curriculum is perfect for anyone interested in creating their own videos for a non-profit or social enterprise.
title: How to Make a Video That Doesn't Suck for Your Non-Profit
